fields.name: Cold Snack
fields.description: A snack is a small serving of food and generally eaten between meals. Snacks come in a variety of forms including packaged snack foods and other processed foods, as well as items made from fresh ingredients at home.

fields.name: Hot Snack
fields.description: Light hot meal / food eaten between regular meals.

fields.name: Salad
fields.description: From side dish to the star attraction, no menu is complete without a salad. From modern ingredients to diverse cuisines, the recipes that have made it into the Appetizer customers' top 50 are all examples of what we love best about salad (with no limp lettuce leaves or soggy tomatoes in sight).

fields.name: Finger food №2 smart box
fields.description:
Inside the box: skewer with pear, parma, and sesame; skewer with figs and camembert cheese; with artichoke and chorizo; skewer with cherry tomato, mozzarella, and basil.

National teams of taste on skewers go to the match in the Finger Food smart box! Skewers with pear, parma and sesame seeds, with artichoke and chorizo against skewers with figs and cheese, with cherry tomatoes and mozzarella. Who will be the winner for the Champions Cup of your taste?

fields.name: Man`s party big box
fields.description:
Inside the box:
Baked chicken drumstick in barbecue sauce; Baked pork ribs in special sauce; Baked potatoes with garlic, grilled vegetables.

When the wife left with her friends for a vacation. When your favorite team is playing. When too lazy to cook, but tired of pizza delivery. When the weekend is at the computer and playing Counter-Strike. In any man’s incomprehensible situation, order MAN’s party box!

fields.name: Chef salads smart box
fields.description:
Inside the box:
Salad made according to the secret recipe of our chef with grapes, walnuts, spinach, honey mustard sauce and Dor Blue cheese; Caesar salad with tender chicken, fried bacon, Iceberg salad, cherry tomatoes, signature sauce and parmesan; Salad with Parma ham, strawberries, spinach, arugula and special sauce. Salad with parma.

When we are told that salads are the simplest dishes on any menu, we don’t argue. We just treat chef salads from our company box. And immediately it is clear that such snacks cannot be repeated. Thanks to our cooks and their secret recipes!

fields.name: Vegetarian smart box
fields.description:
Inside the box:
Sweet homemade carrot mini pie with walnuts; Fragrant pumpkin mini pie; Burrito with spicy hummus, red beans, tomatoes and green onions; Refreshing spring roll with rice, red cabbage, bell pepper slices, fresh tomatoes and Radicio salad. Drizzled with unagi sauce and sprinkled with sesame seeds; Refreshing spring roll with rice noodles, daikon radish, fresh carrots, bell pepper slices, Chinese cabbage and celery stalk. Drizzled with unagi sauce and sprinkled with sesame seeds.

Boxing strongman and boxing athlete. The most wholesome, delicious and smartest. The ingredients inside have undergone minimal heat treatment to maintain beneficial properties. Vegetarian boxing is ordered as a full meal for lunch and dinner after a workout!

fields.name: Beer big box
3 Meats big box
fields.description:
3 meats - 3 sure signs of a good evening! A pork medallion for him, turkey for her, and juicy veal for both of you? Meat medallions set the tone, and vegetable skewers with potato balls and broccoli perfectly complement the taste of your party. We do not know the reasons not to try 3 big box meats now.

Inside the box: Pork medallions with bacon, veal medallions, turkey medallions, vegetable skewers, kebabs with potato balls and broccoli, bruschetta with parmesan and herbs and barbecue sauce.

fields.name: Meat big box
Meat Smart box
fields.description:
Inside the box:
Cheeses: Tomato cheese Baziron and Baziron Pesto with basil, German cow’s cheese Emmental, goat cheese with Truffle, Parmigiano, Italian pistachio cheese made from sheep’s milk Pecorino, Dor blue and soft Danish Brie cheese.
Sausages: Salami with Parmigiano, Parma ham, Italian cooked pork sausage Mortadella and spicy Spanish sausage Chorizo.
Compliments: Dark ciabatta, salted sticks of grissini, walnut and cashew, olives, Kalamata olives, honeycombs, red grapes, apricot jam, thyme and dried figs.

Eat or take a picture? That's the question! With antipasti boxing, your Instagram will instantly be filled with food-porn photos. And the stomach - with excellent varieties of cheese, sausages, grissini, nuts, olives, olives and not only. We know, we know, this box is “too good to be eaten”!

fields.name: Mini burger smart box
fields.description:
It’s good that we did not become the directors of The Matrix. Forgive us, Morpheus, but you can't choose between a red and a green burger. Too tasty both the first and second!

Ingredients: Red burger with slices of Parma ham; Black burger with blue goat cheese with lavender; Green burger with pickled salmon; Yellow burger with grilled chicken.

fields.name: Friends smart box
fields.description:
Inside the box:

Hearty pita bread with spicy hummus.
Appetizing pita bread with chicken.
Pita bread with tender salmon.
Lush croissants with chocolate.
Copyright croissants with salted caramel.

This is a boxing traveler! He travels around the world with large companies and is liked by absolutely everyone: vegetarians, pesketarians, meat-eaters, sweet-tooths and omnivores. Book him on the train and sit on the seat — he doesn't even need a separate ticket. The box is conveniently placed on the table in the train or on the bus. And after the meal - hide under the seat. Enough for 3-4 people. Free delivery to the bus or platform.

fields.name: Cake smart box
fields.description:
Inside the box:
portion cakes Medovik and Napoleon.

Sometimes small things, such as our portioned desserts, bring great pleasure. Cake smart box is suitable for celebrating a birthday, corporate party, buffet ... But you can order without a reason. Do you really need reasons for happiness?

fields.name: Kids sushi smart box
fields.description:
Inside the box:
Roll green with grilled chicken; Roll pink with crab sticks; Roll yellow with homemade mini-sausages; Vegetable roll.

Yesterday they rode on a gyro scooter, today they spin a spinner, and tomorrow they start their own Youtube channel! Yes, yes, we know how quickly the tastes of modern children are changing. But we bet: the sushi in Kids Box is so delicious that it will become a habit for them.

fields.name: Hot finger smart box
fields.description:
Inside the box:

Grilled skewers with squid and octopus, olives and cherry tomatoes; Grilled skewers with corn and sausage, broccoli and champignon; Grilled skewers with chicken, pepper and red onions; Grilled skewers with salmon, zucchini, champignon and bell pepper; Grilled skewers with veal, asparagus, bacon and champignon; Grilled skewers with pork, potatoes and champignon.

Defend yourself! Chef BOX Catering is ready to impress you with new gastronomic combinations! Grilled octopus and flavored corn - resistance is useless!

fields.name: Triple Berry Smoothie
fields.description: banana, frozen strawberries, frozen blackberries, plus more for garnish (optional), frozen raspberries, almond milk, greek yogurt
